title: I keep crashing
body: When get in a match or loading league of legend my macbook, it crash. I get a 10 min penalty just because my computer crashed. How can fix this problem?

replies.body: Hmmmmm if your client keeps crashing like that you might have some corrupted files somewhere. I'd suggest looking over the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), and possibly running a quick repair through the client options to fix that up! Let me know if that doesn't seem to help too much though and we can dig a little further.
Thanks Broporo, I  can play lol
